CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared to the main - chain copolymer of PBDTDPP-OR reported by the Jo group , this side - chain copolymer of PBDT-TDPP-S exhibited a 100 nm blue - shifted maximum absorption peak.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PBDTDPP-OR
2. PBDT-TDPP-S
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the corrected "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

2. PBDT-TDPP-S

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTDPP-OR |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

2. PBDT-TDPP-S

These three entities are relevant to the material properties of the copolymers being compared in the paragraph.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared to the main - chain copolymer of PBDTDPP-OR reported by the Jo group , this side - chain copolymer of PBDT-TDPP-S exhibited a 100 nm blue - shifted maximum absorption peak.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 100 nm - the value of the blue-shifted maximum absorption peak.
2. PBDTDPP-OR - the name of the main-chain copolymer reported by the Jo group.
3. PBDT-TDPP-S - the name of the side-chain copolymer being compared.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 100 nm - the value of the blue-shifted maximum absorption peak.

The other entities, "PBDTDPP-OR" and "PBDT-TDPP-S", are the names of polymers and do not directly refer to material properties or their values.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 100 nm |

The table has one column, "Property Value", and one row with the value "100 nm", which is the blue-shifted maximum absorption peak.
